name: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis with Secondary Capillary Leak Syndrome
chief_complaint: Mom says 'He's coughing up blood and his whole body is swelling up!'
prognosis: Guarded - depends on early recognition and aggressive treatment. May progress to respiratory failure or multi-organ dysfunction.
description: A rare condition characterized by recurrent diffuse alveolar hemorrhage leading to pulmonary hemosiderosis, complicated by systemic capillary leak causing profound edema. Pathogenesis involves autoimmune-mediated damage to pulmonary capillaries with secondary systemic vascular permeability.
multiple_choice: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis with Secondary Capillary Leak Syndrome
